author: Brian Turner
method: Preheat the grill to medium. Place the egg yolk, cheese, cream, mustard, Worcestershire sauce, salt and freshly ground black pepper into a mini food processor and blend until well combined. Top the griddled bread with the egg and cheese mixture and place onto a baking sheet. Grill for 3-4 minutes, or until golden-brown and bubbling on top. Transfer to a serving plate and serve immediately.
ingredients: 1 free-range egg, yolk only,  85g/3oz Danish blue cheese, crumbled,  3 tbsp double cream,  1 tsp Dijon mustard,  dash Worcestershire sauce ,  salt and freshly ground black pepper ,  2 slices crusty white bread, griddled
